unalcol.tracer

Class OutputStreamTracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.tracer.Tracer
      • unalcol.tracer.OutputStreamTracer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleTracer, FileTracer

    public abstract class OutputStreamTracer
extends Tracer
    OutputStreamTracer

    A Tracer based on OuptputStream (stores traced object information in the provided OutputStream).

    Source code is available.

        Parameters:
        SEPARATOR - Character used for separating traced values.
